about_the_game:
App Info
This game is made with Unreal Engine 5 and require 1.5G disk memories.
It is single-play only game and expected play time would be 2~3 hours.

About Game
Modern Museum is mysterious, (a bit of) horror, escaping game.
It is magically haunted museum so you cannot walk out from it since it has countless rooms.
You have to collect 8 relics randomly placed in museum, then you should put each of them in the right display-case inside of guard room.
Each room except for guard room has monster so be careful of them.
Also, you would not want to be detected by strict guards.

Story
You are a statue in a modern museum, however you finally got a spirit!
You need to collect relics somewhere in museum, and put them in the right case to open the magic portal to escape.
But just be aware that you are not the only one that got the spirits.
Some freaky monsters and strict security guards are waiting for you!
I hope you can escape from them.
Then... Good Luck!
